trans-unit.source: Generate recommendations using Mahout and Linux-based HDInsight | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Generate recommendations using Mahout and Linux-based HDInsight | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use the Apache Mahout machine learning library to generate movie recommendations with Linux-based HDInsight (Hadoop).
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use the Apache Mahout machine learning library to generate movie recommendations with Linux-based HDInsight (Hadoop).

trans-unit.source: Generate movie recommendations by using Apache Mahout with Linux-based Hadoop in HDInsight
trans-unit.target: Generate movie recommendations by using Apache Mahout with Linux-based Hadoop in HDInsight

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use the [Apache Mahout](http://mahout.apache.org) machine learning library with Azure HDInsight to generate movie recommendations.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use the [Apache Mahout](http://mahout.apache.org) machine learning library with Azure HDInsight to generate movie recommendations.

trans-unit.source: Mahout is a [machine learning][ml] library for Apache Hadoop.
trans-unit.target: Mahout is a [machine learning][ml] library for Apache Hadoop.

trans-unit.source: Mahout contains algorithms for processing data, such as filtering, classification, and clustering.
trans-unit.target: Mahout contains algorithms for processing data, such as filtering, classification, and clustering.

trans-unit.source: In this article, you will use a recommendation engine to generate movie recommendations that are based on movies your friends have seen.
trans-unit.target: In this article, you will use a recommendation engine to generate movie recommendations that are based on movies your friends have seen.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] The steps in this document require a Linux-based Hadoop on HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] The steps in this document require a Linux-based Hadoop on HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: For information on using Mahout with a Windows-based cluster, see [Generate movie recommendations by using Apache Mahout with Windows-based Hadoop in HDInsight](hdinsight-mahout.md)
trans-unit.target: For information on using Mahout with a Windows-based cluster, see [Generate movie recommendations by using Apache Mahout with Windows-based Hadoop in HDInsight](hdinsight-mahout.md)

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: A Linux-based Hadoop on HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: A Linux-based Hadoop on HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: For information about creating one, see [Get started using Linux-based Hadoop in HDInsight][getstarted]
trans-unit.target: For information about creating one, see [Get started using Linux-based Hadoop in HDInsight][getstarted]

trans-unit.source: Mahout versioning
trans-unit.target: Mahout versioning

trans-unit.source: For more information about the version of Mahout included with your HDInsight cluster, see [HDInsight versions and Hadoop components](hdinsight-component-versioning.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information about the version of Mahout included with your HDInsight cluster, see [HDInsight versions and Hadoop components](hdinsight-component-versioning.md).

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.WARNING] While it is possible to upload a different version of Mahout to the HDInsight cluster, only components provided with the HDInsight cluster are fully supported and Microsoft Support will help to isolate and resolve issues related to these components.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.WARNING] While it is possible to upload a different version of Mahout to the HDInsight cluster, only components provided with the HDInsight cluster are fully supported and Microsoft Support will help to isolate and resolve issues related to these components.

trans-unit.source: Custom components receive commercially reasonable support to help you to further troubleshoot the issue.
trans-unit.target: Custom components receive commercially reasonable support to help you to further troubleshoot the issue.

trans-unit.source: This might result in resolving the issue OR asking you to engage available channels for the open source technologies where deep expertise for that technology is found.
trans-unit.target: This might result in resolving the issue OR asking you to engage available channels for the open source technologies where deep expertise for that technology is found.

trans-unit.source: For example, there are many community sites that can be used, like: [MSDN forum for HDInsight](https://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/azure/en-US/home?forum=hdinsight), [http://stackoverflow.com](http://stackoverflow.com).
trans-unit.target: For example, there are many community sites that can be used, like: [MSDN forum for HDInsight](https://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/azure/en-US/home?forum=hdinsight), [http://stackoverflow.com](http://stackoverflow.com).

trans-unit.source: Also Apache projects have project sites on [http://apache.org](http://apache.org), for example: [Hadoop](http://hadoop.apache.org/), [Spark](http://spark.apache.org/).
trans-unit.target: Also Apache projects have project sites on [http://apache.org](http://apache.org), for example: [Hadoop](http://hadoop.apache.org/), [Spark](http://spark.apache.org/).

trans-unit.source: Understanding recommendations
trans-unit.target: Understanding recommendations

trans-unit.source: One of the functions that is provided by Mahout is a recommendation engine.
trans-unit.target: One of the functions that is provided by Mahout is a recommendation engine.

trans-unit.source: This engine accepts data in the format of `userID`, `itemId`, and `prefValue` (the users preference for the item).
trans-unit.target: This engine accepts data in the format of `userID`, `itemId`, and `prefValue` (the users preference for the item).

trans-unit.source: Mahout can then perform co-occurance analysis to determine: _users who have a preference for an item also have a preference for these other items_.
trans-unit.target: Mahout can then perform co-occurance analysis to determine: _users who have a preference for an item also have a preference for these other items_.

trans-unit.source: Mahout then determines users with like-item preferences, which can be used to make recommendations.
trans-unit.target: Mahout then determines users with like-item preferences, which can be used to make recommendations.

trans-unit.source: The following is an extremely simple example that uses movies:
trans-unit.target: The following is an extremely simple example that uses movies:

trans-unit.source: __Co-occurance__: Joe, Alice, and Bob all liked _Star Wars_, _The Empire Strikes Back_, and _Return of the Jedi_.
trans-unit.target: __Co-occurance__: Joe, Alice, and Bob all liked _Star Wars_, _The Empire Strikes Back_, and _Return of the Jedi_.

trans-unit.source: Mahout determines that users who like any one of these movies also like the other two.
trans-unit.target: Mahout determines that users who like any one of these movies also like the other two.

trans-unit.source: __Co-occurance__: Bob and Alice also liked _The Phantom Menace_, _Attack of the Clones_, and _Revenge of the Sith_.
trans-unit.target: __Co-occurance__: Bob and Alice also liked _The Phantom Menace_, _Attack of the Clones_, and _Revenge of the Sith_.

trans-unit.source: Mahout determines that users who liked the previous three movies also like these three.
trans-unit.target: Mahout determines that users who liked the previous three movies also like these three.

trans-unit.source: __Similarity recommendation__: Because Joe liked the first three movies, Mahout looks at movies that others with similar preferences liked, but Joe has not watched (liked/rated).
trans-unit.target: __Similarity recommendation__: Because Joe liked the first three movies, Mahout looks at movies that others with similar preferences liked, but Joe has not watched (liked/rated).

trans-unit.source: In this case, Mahout recommends _The Phantom Menace_, _Attack of the Clones_, and _Revenge of the Sith_.
trans-unit.target: In this case, Mahout recommends _The Phantom Menace_, _Attack of the Clones_, and _Revenge of the Sith_.

trans-unit.source: Load the data
trans-unit.target: Load the data

trans-unit.source: Conveniently, [GroupLens Research][movielens] provides rating data for movies in a format that is compatible with Mahout.
trans-unit.target: Conveniently, [GroupLens Research][movielens] provides rating data for movies in a format that is compatible with Mahout.

trans-unit.source: Use the following steps to download the data, then load it into the default storage for the cluster:
trans-unit.target: Use the following steps to download the data, then load it into the default storage for the cluster:

trans-unit.source: Use SSH to connect to the Linux-based HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Use SSH to connect to the Linux-based HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: The address to use when connecting is `CLUSTERNAME-ssh.azurehdinsight.net` and the port is `22`.
trans-unit.target: The address to use when connecting is `CLUSTERNAME-ssh.azurehdinsight.net` and the port is `22`.

trans-unit.source: For more information on using SSH to connect to HDInsight, see the following documents:
trans-unit.target: For more information on using SSH to connect to HDInsight, see the following documents:

trans-unit.source: **Linux, Unix or OS X clients**: See [Connect to a Linux-based HDInsight cluster from Linux, OS X or Unix](hdinsight-hadoop-linux-use-ssh-unix.md#connect-to-a-linux-based-hdinsight-cluster)
trans-unit.target: **Linux, Unix or OS X clients**: See [Connect to a Linux-based HDInsight cluster from Linux, OS X or Unix](hdinsight-hadoop-linux-use-ssh-unix.md#connect-to-a-linux-based-hdinsight-cluster)

trans-unit.source: **Windows clients**: See [Connect to a Linux-based HDInsight cluster from Windows](hdinsight-hadoop-linux-use-ssh-windows.md#connect-to-a-linux-based-hdinsight-cluster)
trans-unit.target: **Windows clients**: See [Connect to a Linux-based HDInsight cluster from Windows](hdinsight-hadoop-linux-use-ssh-windows.md#connect-to-a-linux-based-hdinsight-cluster)

trans-unit.source: Download the MovieLens 100k archive, which contains 100,000 ratings from 1000 users for 1700 movies.
trans-unit.target: Download the MovieLens 100k archive, which contains 100,000 ratings from 1000 users for 1700 movies.

trans-unit.source: Extract the archive using the following command:
trans-unit.target: Extract the archive using the following command:

trans-unit.target: This will extract the contents to a new folder named **ml-100k**.

trans-unit.target: Use the following commands to copy the data to HDInsight storage:

trans-unit.target: The data contained in this file has a structure of `userID`, `movieID`, `userRating`, and `timestamp`, which tells us how highly each user rated a movie.

trans-unit.source: Delete temporary data
trans-unit.target: Delete temporary data

trans-unit.source: Mahout jobs do not remove temporary data that is created while processing the job.
trans-unit.target: Mahout jobs do not remove temporary data that is created while processing the job.

trans-unit.source: The `--tempDir` parameter is specified in the example job to isolate the temporary files into a specific path for easy deletion.
trans-unit.target: The `--tempDir` parameter is specified in the example job to isolate the temporary files into a specific path for easy deletion.

trans-unit.source: To remove the temp files, use the following command:
trans-unit.target: To remove the temp files, use the following command:
